headline: Norton Introduces Small Business Premium for Powerful, Easy-to-Use Business-Grade Security
summary: Norton, a leading Cyber Safety brand of Gen™ (NASDAQ: GEN), has launched the new Norton Small Business Premium, an all-in-one, easy-to-use cybersecurity plan specifically designed for entrepreneurs and small businesses. In addition to powerful device security, Norton Small Business Premium features 24/7 Business Tech Support, Financial Monitoring, Social Media Monitoring and more.
